alert.note: Alert for East Becker; East Otter Tail; Grant; Hubbard; Wadena (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 09 at 12:10PM CST until November 11 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON THURSDAY TO 6 AM CST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches and ice accumulations of up to one tenth of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Hubbard, East Becker, East Otter Tail, Wadena and Grant Counties. * WHEN...From noon Thursday to 6 AM CST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be nearly impossible with icy surfaces. The hazardous conditions will impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...More icy conditions are possible if rain changes over sooner.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for North Dakota can be found at dot.nd.gov/travel and for Minnesota at 511mn.org, or by calling 5 1 1 in either state.

area.areaDesc: East Becker; East Otter Tail; Grant; Hubbard; Wadena
